categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic divisions

nodes.text: The Command Division was a division-level unit of the Alliance to Restore the Republic's Special Forces. The Command Division was representative of all the individual regiments and was assigned to Alliance High Command. A Wilderness Fighters regiment was assigned to the High Command base, while Marine and Heavy Weapons Specialists regiments were station on the Alliance Fleet. The other regiments saw service with other Supreme Commands; Alliance Intelligence made use of both the Infiltrator and Pathfinder regiments while Starfighter Command used a mixed force for technical support and ground security. The Command Division answered to General Crix Madine.
